name: right
description:
Gets a specified number of characters from a string,
 beginning at the right.

params.name: count
params.description:
A positive integer or a variable that contains one.
 Number of characters to return.

examples.title: Using right() on a string
examples.description: In this example we'll use right() to return part of a string.
examples.code: writeOutput( right( 'The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog', 8 ) );

examples.title: Using right() in a function
examples.description: In this example we'll use right() in a function to help us to capitalize the last letter in a string.

examples.title: Using right() to test values
examples.description: In this example we'll use right() to test the last five characters of a request context variable.

examples.title: Using right() as a member function
examples.description: CF11+ Lucee4.5+ In this example we'll use right() as a member function inside a function to help us to capitalize the last letter in a string.
